name: qr_app
description: QR Access Control desktop app (Electron + Vite)

scripts.build:web: cd qrac && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev:electron: npm run build:web && npx electron electron/main.js
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean && npm run build:web && npm run icon:build && npx electron-builder --win
scripts.pack:win:nosign: set CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false&& set WIN_CSC_LINK=&& set WIN_CSC_KEY_PASSWORD=&& npm run clean && npm run build:web && npm run icon:build && npx electron-builder --win
